title: Service Agreement and Privacy Policy
message:
This policy applies to all products and services provided by Perfect Ten Intelliving.
Before using 'Perfect Ten Intelliving' products or services, please carefully read and thoroughly understand this policy, especially the terms marked in bold/bold underline.
You should focus on reading and ensure that you fully understand and agree before starting to use.
We will try our best to explain the professional vocabulary involved in this policy in concise and easy to understand terms for your understanding.
This privacy policy will help you understand the following content
  1. Definition and Scope of Application
  2. How do we collect and use your personal information
  3. How does our company use cookies and similar technologies
  4. How can our company share, transfer, and publicly disclose your information
  5. How can our company protect and store your information
  6. How to access and manage your own information, information security
  7. Other
1. Scope of application
  a) When you register for an account in this system, you provide personal registration information (including mobile phone number) as required by this system;
  b) When you use the network services of this system or access the website of this system platform, this system automatically receives and records information on your browser and computer, including but not limited to your IP address, browser type, language used, access date and time, software and hardware feature information, and the webpage records you require;
  c) This system obtains user personal data from business partners through legal means.
  d) Location information: When you use location services, we need to collect and process your location information.
  e) Device information: In order to ensure the normal operation of the service and provide you with problem diagnosis or device detection services, we will collect your hardware model, operating system version, device configuration, unique device identifier, network device hardware address MAC, device connection information, and device status information. Based on different systems, the wording of device information may vary.
  f) Instructions for collecting device permissions:
1. Telephone permission (obtaining mobile phone identification code): When you log in to this platform to identify your device identity, you need to call your telephone permission to obtain this information. Other than this, it will not be called for any other purpose.
2. Storage permission (read-write storage): In order to store necessary application configuration files, as well as the content and reports you choose to download or update, or to read the content you need to upload or synchronize, your storage permission needs to be invoked.
3. Camera permissions: When you use shooting or scanning related functions, we need to invoke your camera permissions.
4. Album permission: When you use the function of changing your avatar or filling in feedback, we need to call your album to obtain image permission to fill in. You understand and agree that the following information is not subject to this Privacy Policy:
  a) The keyword information you enter when using the search service provided by this system platform;
   b) The information and data collected by this system regarding your posting on this system, including but not limited to participation in activities, transaction information, and evaluation details;
  c) Violating legal regulations or violating the rules of this system, as well as the measures taken by this system against you.
2. Information usage
  a) This system will not provide, sell, rent, share or trade your personal information to any unrelated third party unless you have given prior permission, or the third party and this system (including affiliated companies of this system) provide services to you separately or jointly, and after the service ends, they will be prohibited from accessing all of these materials, including those they were previously able to access.
  b) This system also does not allow any third party to collect, edit, sell or disseminate your personal information for free by any means. If any user of this system platform engages in the above activities, once discovered, this system has the right to immediately terminate the service agreement with the user.
  c) For the purpose of serving users, this system may provide you with information through the use of your personal information, including but not limited to sending you product and service information, or sharing information with our system partners so that they can send you information about their products and services (the latter requires your prior consent).
  d) In order to provide better services or products to users, this system may use users' personal information in the following situations: According to the requirements of relevant laws and regulations; According to the user's authorization; According to the relevant service terms and application license agreement of this system.
  e) To provide you with information or services, and to send you the latest news content. If you refuse or turn off device information, the information we push to you will reduce accuracy or relevance, but it will not affect your normal use of other functions that do not require this permission.
3. The use of cookies
  a) If you do not refuse to accept cookies, our system will set or access cookies on your computer so that you can log in or use our platform services or functions that rely on cookies. This system uses cookies to provide you with more thoughtful services, including promotional services.
  b) You have the right to choose to accept or refuse to accept cookies. You can refuse to accept cookies by modifying your browser settings. But if you choose to refuse to accept cookies, you may not be able to log in or use the network services or functions of this system that rely on cookies.
  c) The information obtained through the cookies set up in this system will be subject to this policy.
4. Information Disclosure In the following circumstances, this system will disclose all or part of your personal information based on your personal wishes or legal provisions:
  a) Disclosure to third parties with your prior consent;
  b) To provide the products and services you request, it is necessary to share your personal information with third parties;
  c) Disclosure to third parties or administrative or judicial institutions in accordance with relevant legal provisions or requirements of administrative or judicial institutions;
  d) If you violate relevant Chinese laws, regulations, or this system service agreement or related rules, you need to disclose it to a third party;
  e) If you are a qualified intellectual property complainant and have filed a complaint, at the request of the respondent, you should disclose it to the respondent so that both parties can handle possible rights disputes;
  f) In a transaction created on the platform of this system, if either party fulfills or partially fulfills the transaction obligations and requests information disclosure, this system has the right to decide to provide the user with necessary information such as the contact information of the counterparty to facilitate the completion of the transaction or the resolution of disputes.
  g) Other disclosures deemed appropriate by this system in accordance with laws, regulations, or website policies.
5. Information storage and exchange The information and materials collected by this system about you will be stored on the servers of this system and/or its affiliated companies. These information and materials may be transmitted to your country, region, or overseas where this system collects information and materials, and accessed, stored, and displayed overseas. To ensure the provision of the services described in this privacy policy, we may share necessary personal information with third-party service providers and business partners. In order to enable you to receive information, share information on third-party platforms, use map services, play videos and other necessary functional purposes, our application will embed SDK or other similar applications from authorized partners. If you use a Huawei/Xiaomi/Meizu phone, the Huawei/Xiaomi/Meizu SDK needs to read your device identification number and network related information for sending notification bar messages; If you use the map service provided by Gaode, Gaode SDK requires you to open the device location permission and collect relevant information about the device's location, device identification number, and network connection. We will conduct strict security checks on the application programming interfaces (APIs) and software development kits (SDKs) used by authorized partners to obtain relevant information, and agree with authorized partners on strict data protection measures to process personal information in accordance with our entrusted purposes, service instructions, this privacy policy, and any other relevant confidentiality and security measures. We will also collect your IMSI IMEI. The device MAC address, software list, device serial number, and Android ID are used to determine your last login method, in order to facilitate your use of the login function. The personal information or permissions covered by this policy include:
  (1) Basic information (including personal name, date of birth, gender, address, personal phone number, email);
  (2) Personal identification information (including ID card related identification documents, etc.);
  (3) Property information (including transaction records and virtual property information such as coins and diamonds);
  (4) Personal location information;
  (5) Network identity identification information (including system account, IP address, email address, and related passwords and security); mail list;
  (6) Personal internet browsing records (including search records, software usage records, and click records);
  (7) Personal commonly used device information (including hardware model, device MAC address, operating system type);
  (8) The software list contains unique device identification codes (such as IMEI/Android ID/IDA/OPENUDID/UUID, SIM card IMSI information, etc.) that describe the basic information of commonly used personal devices. There is a behavior of collecting ICCID, Android ID, IP, IMSI, SD card data, IMEI, installation list, device serial number, sensor, MAC, clipboard, etc.
List of third-party SDKs:
  (1) SDK Name: Mobile Intelligent Terminal Supplementary Device Identification System Unified Call SDK Package Name: com.bun SDK manufacturer: China Academy of Information and Communications Technology SDK Description: Get Huawei, Xiaomi OPPO.vivo. Supplementary device identification (OAID, AAID, etc.) for equipment manufacturers such as ZTE, Nubia, Meizu, Lenovo, Samsung, etc Personal Information: Obtain OAID
  (2) SDK Name: Gaode SDK Function: Positioning, map display, and POI query Types of personal information collected: external storage status, latest geographic location information, continuous positioning, network type, network service operator, IMEI, MAC address, WiFi information need to be obtained. Privacy Policy Link: https://lbs.amap.com/pages/privacy/
  (3) SDK name: Alipay Alipay Function: used for Alipay payment. Types of personal information collected: system language, system unique identifier, external storage status, network type, device model, device manufacturer, SIM card serial number, IMEI, MAC address, ANDROIDID, IP address, WiFi information, application installation list, OpenUDID。 Privacy Policy Link: https://www.alipay.com/
  (4) SDK Name: WeChat Function: Use WeChat Open Platform SDK to support WeChat authorized login, WeChat sharing, and WeChat payment. Collect personal information types: third-party accounts, device information (including Open Unique Device Identifier (UDID), Unique Device Identifier (IMEI), IOS Advertising Identifier (IDFA), MAC address, device model, terminal device operating system version, terminal manufacturer), device language, time zone, and network/language status related information for statistical analysis of your use of our service data; Bugly SDK will read your CRASH environment (including CRASH information and thread heap, ROM/RAM/SD card capacity), application package name, application version, application process name, device information (including Open UDID, IOS advertising identifier (IDFA), MAC address, International Mobile Device Identity (IMEI), device model, terminal device operating system version, terminal manufacturer), device language, time zone, and network/language status information to determine and collect CRASH information Privacy Policy Link: https://open.weixin.qq.com/
  (5) SDK Name: QQSDK Collect personal information types: device model, operating system version, unique device identifier, battery, signal strength, software version number, browser type, IP address, geographic location, service log information, communication log information Purpose: To support QQ authorized login and sharing Tencent Privacy Policy: https://www.tencent.com/zh-cn/privacy-policy.html (6) SDK Name: Tencent Bugly SDK Types of personal information collection: When collecting running process information, Tencent Bugly SDK will collect and use log information (including third-party developer custom logs, Logcat logs, and APP crash stack information), network information, system name, system version, IMEI, IMSI, DEVICEID device MAC address, and country code Purpose: To provide app stability monitoring, program crash reporting, and help developers quickly identify problems User Agreement: https://bugly.qq.com/v2/contract
6. How to access and manage your own information, information security
  (1) Information Security
    a) All accounts have security protection functions, please keep your username and password information safe. We will ensure that your information is not lost, abused, or altered through security measures such as encrypting user passwords. Despite the aforementioned security measures, please also note that there are no 'comprehensive security measures' on the information network.
    b) When using the network services of this system for online transactions, you inevitably need to disclose your personal information, such as contact information or postal address, to the counterparty or potential counterparty. Please protect your personal information properly and only provide it to others when necessary. If you discover that your personal information has been leaked, especially your username and password in this system, please contact our customer service immediately so that we can take appropriate measures.
  (2) How to access and manage your own information
    a) We will take appropriate technical measures to ensure that you can access your registration information. You can view your profile picture, nickname, and other information through 'My', and click 'Settings' to modify your nickname.
    b) Account cancellation You can cancel your account by clicking on 'My' - 'Settings' - 'Cancel Account', entering your login password. After account cancellation, we will delete or anonymize the personal information that has already been collected.
7. Other
1. The signing, effectiveness, implementation, and dispute resolution of this privacy policy shall be governed by the laws of the People's Republic of China.
2. Any disputes related to this agreement shall be resolved through friendly consultation. If consultation fails, the dispute shall be submitted to the court with jurisdiction over the location of the company for litigation.
